oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 10: Organic Maintenance (Stewardship) Payments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Education, extension and communication
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: New organic maintenance payments under the Organic Farming Scheme in Wales were launched in March 2004, as one of the ‘agri-environment’ payments to farmers for managing their land for wildlife and wider benefits to the environment. This factsheet aims to provide answers to some of the key questions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2004) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 10: Organic Maintenance (Stewardship) Payments. Organic Centre Wales.
